services.title: Classic Lashes - Full Set
services.description: Classic lash extensions are one lash extension applied to one natural lash.

services.title: Classic Lashes - Infill
services.description: Infills are carried out every 2-3 weeks, this treatment can take up to 1.5 hours.

services.title: Classic Lashes - Speedy Infill
services.description: Speedy infills are carried out every 1-2 weeks, this treatment can take up to 30 minutes.

services.title: Removal
services.description: Please ensure your lash extension removal is carried out by a professional, this treatment can take up to 15 minutes.
